Welcome to GAP Holiday Wonderland!

The GAP Holiday Wonderland is an interactive night with games, events, competitions, and lots of fun! We are a completely student-run club whose goal is to raise money for local and international non-profits. This year, all funds raised will be donated to Action Against Hunger—an organization dedicated to providing food and resources to impoverished areas worldwide. If you'd like to donate directly, use the QR code below.

Event Details

Date: December 20th

Time: 5:30 - 8:30 PM

Location: Trinity Bible Fellowship

Organizations That Will Be At The Event

We're proud to feature several incredible organizations at our event. Please take a moment to visit them and learn about their important causes.

  • Animal Rescue League: Provides shelter, medical care, and adoption services for abandoned and abused animals.
  • Save The Children: Works to improve the lives of children worldwide through education, healthcare, and emergency relief.
  • Disabled American Veterans (DAV): Offers support and resources to help veterans access benefits, healthcare, and career opportunities.

Events

Enjoy various festive events that bring the holiday spirit to life. One event is included with your ticket, and any additional event is just $2!

  • Ornament Decorating: Let your creativity shine as you decorate your holiday ornament to take home.
  • Stocking Decorating: Personalize a stocking to hang for Santa!
  • Snowflake Decorating: Create unique snowflakes to display in your home.
  • Sock Snowman Decorating: Craft your adorable sock snowman to enjoy this winter season.

Competitions

Test your skills and have some fun with our holiday-themed competitions!

  • Holiday Rap: Compete to create the most creative holiday rap!
  • Best Dressed Santa: Come dressed as Santa and compete to win the title of "Best Dressed Santa."
  • Present Wrapping Race: See how fast you can wrap a present! Speed and neatness count!

Pictures With Santa!

Capture a magical moment with Santa! For just $5, you can take a picture with Santa, and we'll send it to you online afterward.

Food and Drinks

Stay fueled with delicious holiday treats and warm drinks. Here's what we'll have available for sale:

  • Loaded Hot Cocoa: Warm and indulgent hot cocoa with all the fixings.
  • Hot Cider: A comforting, warm spiced cider for the holidays.
  • Pretzels: Soft, salty pretzels to enjoy while you walk around.
  • Candy Canes: A classic holiday treat for everyone.
  • Cookies: Freshly baked cookies to satisfy your sweet tooth.
  • And More!: We'll have a variety of other snacks and drinks to keep you going all night.

Ticket Sales

You can reserve your tickets for the event below or purchase them at the entrance. All ticket sales will be cash-only, so please come prepared. This event is designed for children and adults, so bring the whole family for a fun night! We can't wait to see you there!

About GAP

Globalization Action Partnership (GAP) is a student-run organization committed to hosting impactful events that raise funds for non-profits around the world. Our goal is to engage the community in charitable causes while having fun. This year, we're proud to support Action Against Hunger and contribute to their life-saving work around the globe. For more information, or if you would like to donate, please use the QR code below or contact us at:

  • Email: info@gap.com

© 2024 GAP - Globalization Action Partnership
